lines.text: Are you familiar with this cross-bow? It's the latest in silent assault weapons technology. The tip of this arrow explodes three seconds after penetration.
You've got to stop thinking of me as just another pretty face.
Jewel Panther! You are as beautiful as you are deadly!
And when we find them, we can hunt them down like small animals, and no one will be able to hear their cries of pain and despair.
You better be nice to me or I'll tell Uncle Jessie what you did to that chicken last night.

[at Becky]
Those martial-arts skills are very impressive, but let's not forget who has the gun.
[Becky and Jewel go at each other. Mark and Chris try to help, but Santiago stops them]
I just love a good catfight.
